channel.title: Stop Dragon Claw Spawning - Rep++
channel.description:
Hello MoparScape community, I have an urgent question that I really need answered.
So I have a 508 server. Its all running well, got the client online and everything. My server has ::item pickups. I have made a dragon godsword, brawler godsword and dragon claws very powerful. For this reason I want to change it so that only these 3 items cannot be spawned by using the ::item pickup code?
Credit + Rep will go to the answerer of this question that makes it work for me :)
Thanks alot
~ Crunch ~

item.title: Stop Dragon Claw Spawning - Rep++
item.dc:creator: @Crunch Crunch
item.description:
@Crunch wrote:

I replaced this for my whole pickup command and also added an extra unspawnable item. But when i try to compile it comes up with about 29 errors?

Read full topic

item.title: Stop Dragon Claw Spawning - Rep++
item.dc:creator: @gergy008 gergy008
item.description:
@gergy008 wrote:

Okay, Change the 000’s for your items ID’s

if(command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 1){ String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { if (newItemID == 000 || newItemID == 000 || newItemID == 000){ sM("You cannot ::pickup this item!"); } else { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100"); } }

Replace this for your entire ::pickup command

Read full topic

item.title: Stop Dragon Claw Spawning - Rep++
item.dc:creator: @nicks nicks
item.description:
@nicks wrote:

i don’t know how to do this but dont say your going to rep++ someone when u cant do it
